field.name: summary
field.value: CVSI Velocity/HTML Parser cannot handle HTML comments

field.name: description
field.value:
The Velocity/HTML-Parser has an error. It is not able to handle the following simple example:

Some text

At the end of the comment it signals an error. The error output is as follows: The parser has been pre-emptively terminated because it appears as if the parser is stuck. [In ParseXmlRestElement()] Expected 'XmlTagStart' but was 'XmlComment' Expected 'XmlForwardSlash' but was 'XmlComment' Expected '>' Obviously it doesn't expect a comment there but a tag.
